Reviews.Content: stayed night hotel expo centre close airport bit closer city hotel situated residential neighborhood 10min foot metro metro 15min zeytinburnu tram tram goes straight downtown blue mosque bazar kabatas perfect airport city short layover buffet excellent probably ive 4star hotel numerous local clothes shops en route zeytinburnu nice shirts pants etc 5usd downside hotel residential hard food hours
